response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your business operations. The product, valued at $1,500,000 to you, is an exclusive opportunity that we are offering with the aim of maximizing its impact on your endeavors.

Considering the immense benefits this product can bring to you, we propose a purchase price of $1,250,000. This price reflects our commitment to providing high-quality solutions while also ensuring a fair return for our investment.

Please let us know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision. We are confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations, contributing to the growth and success of your organization.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
